Middle Manual

Toolbar / Icon:
   
Menu: Snap - Middle Manual
Shortcut: S, N
Commands: snapintersectionmiddlemanual | sn

Description:

This tool allows you to snap to a point that is in the middle between two points. This is most commonly used to snap to the center of a rectangle or polygon by choosing two diagonally opposite corners.

Procedure:

  1. After activating this snap tool, specify the first of the two points that define the middle point. For example one corner of a rectangle.
  2. Click the second of the two points, for example the diagonally opposite corner of the rectangle.
